bio: Welcome to the personal website of Kenneth Sun.

I'm a student in high school. I'm curious, genuine, and pretty easy-going. I enjoy coding, music, skiing, reading... my favorite fruit is strawberry and my favorite color is #1998DB (it's the blue color on this page).
Things I've made can be found at projects; things I've wrote at writings. For information about myself, just keep scrolling.

hobbies.name: programming
desc: I like learning about new languages and tools. I've done a bit of web development and computer networking,
and I'm currently trying to learn Lisp for writing software.

hobbies.name: writing
desc: I find writing really useful in clarifying my thinking, and for recording them to my future self.
I write reflectively in my private journal, but I make some writings public on my writings page.
